body:
* Added dependency libtasn1, previously missed.  (tasn1 is a low-level GNU library)

* Updates to support proj@6:
  * Updated to grass@7.8.1: for +grass7 because it support proj@6
  * Updated dependency to proj@6, depending on QGIS version (QGIS docs are unclear about which QGIS version is the first to support proj@6)

* Removed dependency on HDF5.  It's not needed because netcdf-c already depends on HDF5.  Its presence causes concretization errors.
title: qgis: Updates for proj@6
